text: is a Japanese racing driver. He currently drives at the Super GT series in the GT500 category. In 2007 he won the Super GT 500 championship, in the ARTA NSX with Ralph Firman. Itō is also a regular presenter of Best Motoring. ==24 Hours of Le Mans results== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- ! Year ! Team ! Co-Drivers ! Car ! Class !
